title: FS: 23 T-206 Grades PSA 3 to PSA 5

posts.post_title: FS: 23 T-206 Grades PSA 3 to PSA 5
posts.post_content:
Fresh group from PSA. All prices include shipping in the US. Add additional 4.00 for Canada and .50 per additional card. Paypal is acceptable as is Money order and check. Feel free to make legitimate offers on singles or groups. PM has priority.
